build: bun --version && bun install --no-save || bun install; if bun run -s build >/dev/null 2>&1; then bun run build; else echo "[forgeon] no build script; skipping"; fi
start: if bun run -s start >/dev/null 2>&1; then bun run start; else if [ -f dist/index.js ]; then bun dist/index.js; elif [ -f src/index.ts ]; then bun run src/index.ts; else echo "[forgeon] no start script and no known entry (dist/index.js / src/index.ts)"; exit 1; fi; fi

build_meta.notes: prefers scripts.start; falls back to dist or src
